channel.title: Information Leak on ByteTheCookies
channel.description: Recent content in Information Leak on ByteTheCookies

item.title: MovieReviewApp
item.description: MovieReviewApp Description: Last web challenge done in the ctf (unfortunately) also one of the fastest to do if you know the right tools Introduction The challenge looks like a very simple site in pure html where we see reviews on movies Source Is not present the source BUT… Solution The first thing that stands out is that in the URL there are extensions, so we understand that probably the system behind it is not very complex, in fact, going to the root endpoint we notice
